game.name: Vikings Vs Skeletons
game.description:
It is always wonderful to play the role of a true warrior and fight against the bad souls! Today we have brought to you a brand new adventure challenge where you will get a chance to be a Viking and fight against a horde of skeletons. Are you ready to accept this unique challenge? If yes, join Vikings Vs Skeletons and be prepared to beat all the undead, skeletons, monsters and grab all the hearts and stars you see along the way! 

Your undead enemies are available in a big number so you need to be alert all the time while fighting against them in this adventure-platformer game. Use your sword fast to clear the maximum number of enemies from the platform! There are 6 unique and challenging levels to play through. Your objective is to complete each level without being harmed. Fight for the glory and focus on creating the best score possible in the end! 

Common boys! We are pretty confident that you are skilled enough to beat all the deadly souls, clear all the levels and become the player with the maximum possible points. You have to challenge your fighting abilities and quick reaction skills to win in this adventure side-scroller game. Try out other adventure games for boys on our website to seek for extra fun and enjoyment! Our 2D platformer challenges are playable on multiple devices, including desktops, mobile phones, tablets and iPhones or iPads.

game.mobileControlKeys: LEFT ICONS TO MOVE, RIGHT ICONS TO HIT AND JUMP
game.webControlKeys: L-R ARROWS TO LEFT RIGHT,UP ARROWS -JUMP, X TO HIT
